verses.text: In the \w ninth|strong="H8671"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, in the \w tenth|strong="H6224"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* and all his \w army|strong="H2428"\w* against \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and they \w besieged|strong="H6696"\w* it.

\add And\add* in the \w eleventh|strong="H6249"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*, in the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, the \w ninth|strong="H8672"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* was broken \w up|strong="H1234"\w*.

And all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w sat|strong="H3427"\w* in the \w middle|strong="H8432"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \add even\add* \w Nergal-sharezer|strong="H5371"\w*, \w Samgar-nebo|strong="H5562"\w*, \w Sarsechim|strong="H8310"\w*, \w Rab-saris|strong="H7249"\w*, \w Nergal-sharezer|strong="H5371"\w*, \w Rab-mag|strong="H7248"\w*, with all the \w residue|strong="H7611"\w* of the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass, \add that\add* when \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* them, and all the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w*, then they \w fled|strong="H1272"\w*, and went \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* by \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, by the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* betwixt the two \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*: and he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H6160"\w*.

But the \w Chaldeans’|strong="H3778"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them, and \w overtook|strong="H5381"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*: and when they had \w taken|strong="H3947"\w* him, they brought him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to \w Nebuchadnezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* to \w Riblah|strong="H7247"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Hamath|strong="H2574"\w*, where he \w gave|strong="H1696"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* upon him.\f + \fr 39.5 \ft gave…: Heb. spake with him judgments\f*

Then the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* in \w Riblah|strong="H7247"\w* before his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*: also the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w slew|strong="H7819"\w* all the \w nobles|strong="H2715"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

Moreover he put \w out|strong="H5786"\w* \w Zedekiah’s|strong="H6667"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* him with \w chains|strong="H5178"\w*, to \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*.\f + \fr 39.7 \ft with…: Heb. with two brasen chains, or, fetters\f*

¶ And the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w burned|strong="H8313"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and brake \w down|strong="H5422"\w* the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

Then \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* carried away \w captive|strong="H1540"\w* into \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w remained|strong="H7604"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and those that fell \w away|strong="H5307"\w*, that \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* to him, with the \w rest|strong="H3499"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w remained|strong="H7604"\w*.\f + \fr 39.9 \ft captain…: or, chief marshal: Heb. chief of the executioners, or, slaughtermen\f*

But \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* of the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which had \w nothing|strong="H3972"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* them \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w* and \w fields|strong="H3010"\w* at the same \w time|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 39.10 \ft captain…: or, chief marshal: Heb. chief of the executioners, or, slaughtermen\f*\f + \fr 39.10 \ft at the…: Heb. in that day\f*

¶ Now \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* gave \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* concerning \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,\f + \fr 39.11 \ft to: Heb. by the hand of\f*\f + \fr 39.11 \ft captain…: or, chief marshal: Heb. chief of the executioners, or, slaughtermen\f*

\w Take|strong="H3947"\w* him, and look \w well|strong="H5869"\w* to him, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* him no \w harm|strong="H3972"\w*; but \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto him even as he shall \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 39.12 \ft look…: Heb. set thine eyes upon him\f*

So \w Nebuzar-adan|strong="H5018"\w* the \w captain|strong="H7227"\w* of the \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w Nebushasban|strong="H5021"\w*, \w Rab-saris|strong="H7249"\w*, and \w Nergal-sharezer|strong="H5371"\w*, \w Rab-mag|strong="H7248"\w*, and all the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon’s|strong="H0894"\w* \w princes|strong="H7227"\w*;\f + \fr 39.13 \ft captain…: or, chief marshal: Heb. chief of the executioners, or, slaughtermen\f*

Even they \w sent|strong="H7971"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* out of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*, and \w committed|strong="H5414"\w* him unto \w Gedaliah|strong="H1436"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahikam|strong="H0296"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Shaphan|strong="H8227"\w*, that he should \w carry|strong="H3318"\w* him \w home|strong="H1004"\w*: so he \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

¶ Now the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*, while he was shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* in the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* of the \w prison|strong="H4307"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H1980"\w* and \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Ebed-melech|strong="H5663"\w* the \w Ethiopian|strong="H3569"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* of \w hosts|strong="H6635"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w* upon this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and not for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; and they shall be \add accomplished\add* in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee.

But I will \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* thee in that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and thou shalt not be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* of \w whom|strong="H6440"\w* thou \add art\add* \w afraid|strong="H3016"\w*.

For I will \w surely|strong="H4422"\w* \w deliver|strong="H4422"\w* thee, and thou shalt not \w fall|strong="H5307"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, but thy \w life|strong="H5315"\w* shall be for a \w prey|strong="H7998"\w* unto thee: because thou hast put thy \w trust|strong="H0982"\w* in me, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
